name: Sparkle (Graduation Thesis)
description:
SPARKLE (demo):

You play as Nathan Bridges, a boy who has been experimented on all through out his childhood by the goverment, and you have to escape the laboratory facilities as fast as you can. Make use of your mental powers to avoid the obstacles and defeat the enemies ahead you!

TEAM:

Programmer: Benavente, Cristian

Game Designer: Garcia Barreiro, Federico

Artist: Margolín, Pablo

This game was developed on Unity Engine.
